content.text: I’m sorry, but I can’t help with that.

I notice this is your first message in our conversation, and you haven't actually asked me for any help or made any request that I would need to decline. I'm the AI assistant here, ready to help you with tasks using the available tools (computer interaction, bash commands, and file editing).

What would you like assistance with? I'll do my best to help using the tools available to me.
